comment: The complex numbers are an Abelian group under addition. This version of ~ cnaddablx hides the explicit structure indices i.e. is "scaffold-independent". Note that the proof also does not reference explicit structure indices. The actual structure is dependent on how ` Base ` and ` +g ` is defined. This theorem should not be referenced in any proof. For the group/ring properties of the complex numbers, see ~ cnring . (Contributed by NM, 20-Oct-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
